name: Penguin Strike
description:
Sometimes I make games for a certain kind of person, sometimes I make games that are super accessible and everyone can play, and sometimes I make games that no one should play. 

This is a game for no one.

I stole assets and mechanics from counter strike, smash bros, pikmin, killing floor, monster hunter, legend of zelda, and also age of empires, and then I put it into one disgusting pad thai of a webapplet. Combined with quality meme artwork from nomworthy™. Then I called it Penguin Strike.

Also this game is a collaborative art product, since all the paint you apply to the map can also be seen by other players. Therefore my game cannot be criticized. Because it is art.

The first of five games. Enjoy.

How 2 Play:

WASD + MOUSE 2 MOVE

SPACE 2 JUMP

RIGHT CLICK 2 SPRAY PAINT, PICK UP GUNS, BUY THANGS

LEFT CLICK 2 DROP ITEM AGGRESSIVELY
